name: Google Ads IMA SDK Android Examples v3.28.2-0
body:
#### Google Ads IMA SDK Android Samples v3.28.2-0


Requires the [IMA Android SDK jar](https://developers.google.com/interactive-media-ads/docs/sdks/android/download)
or adding the IMA Android SDK as a gradle dependency:
```
compile 'com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3:interactivemedia:X.Y.Z'
```
Replace `X.Y.Z` with the needed library version.
All releases are designed for Android Studio.


|  Download | Description |
| ------ | -------------- |
| [BasicExample](https://github.com/googleads/googleads-ima-android/releases/download/3.28.2-0/BasicExample3.28.2-0.zip) | Basic integration of the IMA SDK into an Android app.
| [AdvancedExample](https://github.com/googleads/googleads-ima-android/releases/download/3.28.2-0/AdvancedExample3.28.2-0.zip) | Integration of the IMA SDK into an Android app demonstrating multiple videos and ad tag types. |
| [ExoPlayerExample](https://github.com/googleads/googleads-ima-android/releases/download/3.28.2-0/ExoPlayerExample3.28.2-0.zip) | Integration of the IMA SDK into an Android app using the ExoPlayer IMA extension. |
| [AudioPlayerExample](https://github.com/googleads/googleads-ima-android/releases/download/3.28.2-0/AudioPlayerExample3.28.2-0.zip) | Integration of the IMA with ExoPlayer for Background Audio. |

body:

Note: Updated version numbering to match the version numbering of the IMA SDK.

Requires the [IMA Android SDK jar](https://developers.google.com/interactive-media-ads/docs/sdks/android/download)
or adding the IMA Android SDK as a gradle dependency:
```
compile 'com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3:interactivemedia:X.Y.Z'
```
Replace `X.Y.Z` with the desired library version.
All releases are designed for Android Studio.

name: Google Ads IMA SDK Android Examples v3.14
body:
#### Google Ads IMA SDK Android Samples v3.14

Requires the [IMA Android SDK jar](https://developers.google.com/interactive-media-ads/docs/sdks/android/download)
  or adding the IMA Android SDK as a gradle dependency:
```
compile 'com.google.ads.interactivemedia.v3:interactivemedia:X.Y.Z'
```
Replace `X.Y.Z` with the desired library version.
All releases are designed for Android Studio.


|  Download | Description |

| [AdvancedExample](https://github.com/googleads/googleads-ima-android/releases/download/2.3/AdvancedExample2.3.zip) | Integration of the IMA SDK into an Android app demonstrating multiple videos and ad tag types. |
|  |  |

name: Google Ads IMA SDK Android Examples v2.2

Release notes:  Adds AdvancedExample to demonstrate content playlists and multiple ad tags

Requires the [IMA Android SDK jar](https://developers.google.com/interactive-media-ads/downloads).
All releases are designed for Android Studio.

| [BasicExample](https://github.com/googleads/googleads-ima-android/releases/download/2.2/BasicExample2.2.zip) | Basic integration of the IMA SDK into an Android app. |
